properties.title: WS Code Generation and other Tools

section.name: Tool Integrations
section.p: soapUI provides integrated support for a number of Open Source Web Service Tool Kits and utilities, including;

ol.li: Code Generation Tools allow generation of client or implementation artifacts from an existing WSDL definition in a soapUI project.
WS-I Tools integrates WS-I Basic Profile validation tools into soapUI
Apache TcpMon provides TCP traffic monitoring functionality

section.p: If you would like us to integrate any other tools (AJAX, PHP, etc...), donâ€™t hesitate to send us a link to the documentation for the command line utility that should be invoked together with some examples and we will consider integrating the tool for you.

subsection.name: Configuration
subsection.p: Before any of the integrations can be used, the respective tools need to be installed separately (they are not bundled with soapUI) and their location configured on the "Integrated Tools" tab in the soapUI preferences:
